name: Racing Roguelike
description:
Race around in procedurally generated tracks! Collect gas barrels to refuel and keep your engine running to finish as many races as possible! Move to the tent to finish the race and move to the next! 

Controls:

Drive - W and S  or  Up and Down Arrows

Turn - A and D or Left and Right Arrows

Attributions:

Menu Music - https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/punky

Main Music - https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/happy-rock

Engine FX - https://freesound.org/people/Eponn/sounds/421001/

Gas Barrel Pickup FX - https://freesound.org/people/bevibeldesign/sounds/315931/

Everything Else - https://www.kenney.nl/assets
